subtitle: Hello everyone, today I want to pass on to you a lesson I was given
from when I was a member of a Gnostic group; this lesson and technique was considered
a key aspect and tool in order to awaken our consciousness while sleeping and it's called:
The Ley of SOL ~ I know I should have released the upcoming Q&A video by now as promised, I am working
on it but i've just been very busy and there's a lot of really good questions there that i
really want to answer in-depth for you so expect a fairly long video for that hopefully next week, so
a lot of you have been interested in Gnosticism and asking me what it's all about since there
are many different lineages and types of it so instead of trying to tell you what it is i think
you'll get a better feel for it if i just give you some of the direct information and guidance that i
learned while studying and practicing there, with that said if you are really interested in
gnosticism and really wondering what it all is about i'll leave 4 good links
in the description below including a very nice short video which gives a taste as to its true
meaning in reality Gnosis, or Gnosticism, or to be a Gnostic, doesn't mean a particular
system of belief or about a particular book that was written thousands of years ago or something
nor does it mean it's about a group of people at a particular time in history - Gnosticism in a way
is more related to Omnism which is the recognition and respect of all religions
by understanding the truth of them all and how they interconnect to each other
instead of focusing on the impure parts of religions which have degenerated and become
obscured over time because of men, war and whatever other reason but of course tell all this to your
local priest and they won't agree with you because it doesn't keep them in business right?
so if you enjoy this video and would like me to do more types of these Gnostic lessons then please do
let me know in the comments below, the nice thing about it is that many of the teachings are direct
and specific tools or systems and structures of information that is very practical and applicable
to daily life, so listen carefully take your own little notes if you like in order for you to
remember the main points that i'm about to give; so let's get into this Key of SOL - the foundation of
it, or the rationale of it, is based upon the fact that the human being comes out into the Astral
body every night when we sleep and that we travel around unconsciously doing chores, running errands,
walking about aimlessly without any awareness at all and that we often interpret these as
dreams and so it is taught that if one understands this one will also understand
why it is a common occurrence for the dead to not accept that they are dead...
therefore we need a specific tool in order to awaken consciousness and break out of
this unconscious type of awareness: the key to this is in discernment
so we have things such as reality checks right? most of you know what this is and i've talked
about it before if you make a habit of jumping in the physical with the intention of flying then
you'll eventually do it in your nightly excursions too and you'll naturally realize it's a dream
right? now similarly the Key of SOL is essentially an advanced form of reality check - it's an advanced
form of reality check in the sense that it is a much more rigorous type of practical observation
or practical self-observation, and so the specific practice is to divide our awareness into the
observation of discerning three specific things - which are: Subject, Object Location - you see? S-O-L; SOL
so, let's break it down number 1: Subject: subject means to be aware of you, it means to
watch yourself each second of every moment, this means to be in a state of alertness
towards your thoughts, actions, emotions, habits, words and so forth; it's about remembering yourself
that's it ~ be aware of yourself and what you're doing, when we're unconsciously in the Astral
we're never aware of what we're thinking, feeling or doing but instead we're just
living on autopilot without any conscious control; is your body moving a certain way? are you having
strange thoughts? are you in a particular mood? why? it is about being aware of your entire being
you as a whole ~ as an experiencer of your experience so look at yourself with curiosity as
if you don't know who you are, as a scientist would objectively look at a subject - you are the subject
number 2 - object: object means to be aware of everything that's around you and more importantly
not identify with them, for example if you see a beautiful object like a suit in a window, a nice
car, a fancy restaurant - do not be identified with it; in other words don't get fascinated by it with
your own subjectivity: see things without labeling them or judging them, this is an important aspect
because for example often in our dreams we look at objects such as perhaps a camel is in the middle
of our bedroom yet we don't reflect on why it's there and instead we identify or react immediately
and become confused or start some kind of drama or the camel might ask you a question related to
one of your interests that you're identified with and you may even get into a conversation
with the camel and not question the camel, the object, at all so we need to deeply reflect
on the objects around us and notice if anything is out of place so that's it - be alert of the
objects around you in a critical and objective way ~ when we're unconsciously in the astral we
often get fascinated, enchanted, identified and marvel at different things instead of actually
attentively looking at them and questioning the reality of them in a fresh and unassuming way
number 3 - location: location means to be aware of why you are where you are; it means
to observe and ask yourself what is this place? why am i here? what did i do to get here?
how did i get here? to this shop? to this park? or this office? or this temple? we especially need to ask it
when we're in our own home because we do a lot of unconscious living when we're inside our homes
when we're unconsciously in the astral we often find ourselves walking from place to place
not even questioning how we got there in the first place, and if we really just asked it in the astral
we would realize very quickly that it makes perfect sense that how you got to where you are is
actually complete nonsense when compared to your usual material life and how you get to places in
normal ordinary circumstances physically right? so, that's it - Subject-Object-Location; now it may seem
insignificant if you don't understand the depth of how intensely you can actually practice this in
your awareness, as i said this is an advanced form of reality check, this is an astral reality check
for subject; don't assume your thoughts and feelings are normal ask yourself why you're
feeling them and how you got to those types of particular feelings... for object; don't just look
at objects in a different way but really question what they are, if it's behaving normally and take
a second glance at objects too just to make sure... for location; don't just assume wherever you are
is where you should be, really play out in your mind the different scenarios that got you to
this particular point, for example; run through your head when you left your home, what roads you walked
down, whether you stopped at some shops on the way, and how you really got to where you are right now...
are you really aware of your reactions, thoughts and feelings towards what i'm saying right now?
are you actually listening to what i'm saying? or are you just hearing me speak and
playing your own narrative of thoughts over my voice? don't answer with words - pay attention.
are you really sure that the phone in your hand or computer you're using is actually
a physical object? did you ever contemplate that? or be mindful of that? or consider that?
are all the objects in your house right now the usual ones you own? look around you and check
thoroughly - do not assume... are you really aware of where you are and how you got to where you are
sitting or standing right now? did you consciously choose to listen to this video? don't just assume
it - go into it; replay your day over, you can be aware of all these things from moment-to-moment
all the time ~ by this intensive reflective practice and combining being aware of these three things
and vigorously exercising our awareness like, this it eventually turns into a muscle and habit
that will also naturally take place in the astral in your sleep, you'll have logic for the first time
in your astral life because you'll start having logical awareness in your physical awareness too
this type of reality checking naturally helps us go beyond dreaming too if you are really
exercising the subject part especially right? to be highly and distinctly aware of your thoughts,
dreams, emotions, fears and all that and not to be identified with any of that because those
things are things that suck us into unconscious dreaming - so these three tools of awareness is
a trinity of power don't underestimate the power; of your mind - you know some people ask what is
meditation? is it breathing? is it watching thoughts? or feeling the body? which is it?
don't you realize that you can do more than one thing at the same time? you do it all the
time right? right now you're listening to me, maybe texting someone at the same time, you're breathing,
perhaps scratching your leg, hearing other sounds, thinking of the thoughts etc, do not underestimate
what your mind is capable of ~ you're able to be aware of these aspects of subject, object
and location all at the same time, it's similar to how we learn a new complex concept right? at first
we think about all the things and study a concept but then when it comes to just thinking about the
concept we're aware of the many things that that concept implies, of course like everything that
needs to be mastered it takes practice, at first you'll probably have to say to yourself slowly:
"subject, okay i must be aware of my thoughts, what am i feeling? what am i thinking?" and then you say
"object" and you really look around at different things without assuming what they are and then
you say "location" and ask yourself and replay in your mind where and how you got to where you
are right now, really checking if that's true, and asking yourself all these questions - so at first
go through it like that if you like exercise your awareness without any judgments or identifications
and after a while you should be able to develop this trinity of awareness instinctively without
having to think too mechanically and slowly like just how i broke it down
eventually you'll just be aware of all 3 aspects together and you'll experience it as a
sort of expansion of conscious active awareness - this is the true meaning behind the Key of SOL
this is why S-O-L has come together as subject, object and location because it's all 3
together and awareness can be cultivated in this way ~ so do it as many times as you can,
do it as many times as you like for as many days and you'll get better with practice if you
do this properly and you really commit to just this one thing, nothing else is required of you
i assure you you'll have more experiences than you've ever had, work on this one thing
instead of looking to soak in knowledge from 100 books all the time and desperately looking
outside of yourself right, just commit to this one practice and you'll see in a powerful way
the benefits of this practice, if you really do it at every moment of your daily living unceasingly
without pausing, you'll see tremendous improvements in overall self-awareness; both in the physical
and also during sleep... so that's it it takes commitment and willpower and a firm resolve to
do this a firm decision right, and you know if any of you have success with this practice
please do come back to this video and let me know about your experiences and how it's affecting your
awareness, i'd love to read your experiences and efforts with it as i always do and again
you know let me know if you like this sort of structured specific tool and what you think about
it and whether i should do more videos like this about useful practices that i learned from
Gnosticism - also a big thank you and shout out to Wibisino, Kevin, AstralTransfixion, Dan and Borman
who raised his pledge so I'm very grateful to you all - if you'd like to support Astral Doorway too and
have access to our live Q&A discussion sessions then simply follow the Patreon link in the
description below ~ this is Gene and I'll see you on the Astral plane reminding you of the Key of SOL!
